name: scorched-earth
description: A modern reimagining of the classic 1991 DOS artillery game with synthwave aesthetics

scripts.build:web: rm -rf www && mkdir -p www/node_modules/convex/dist && cp -r index.html style.css config.js js assets www/ && cp node_modules/convex/dist/browser.bundle.js www/node_modules/convex/dist/
scripts.build:ios: npm run build:web && npx cap sync ios
scripts.ios:sync: mkdir -p www/js www/assets www/node_modules/convex/dist && rsync -av --delete index.html style.css config.js www/ && rsync -av --delete js/ www/js/ && rsync -av --delete assets/ www/assets/ && cp node_modules/convex/dist/browser.bundle.js www/node_modules/convex/dist/ && npx cap copy ios
